publications.title: Enhanced Alzheimer's Brain Scan Dataset: Normal and Synthesized
publications.description: A comprehensive dataset of normal and synthesized Alzheimer's brain scans for developing and testing diagnostic models.

publications.title: MosqVision-3K: A Balanced Multi-Source Dataset of 3,000 Annotated Images for Culex, Anopheles, and Aedes Mosquito Species Classification
publications.description: A balanced dataset containing 3,000 annotated images of three major mosquito species for classification tasks.

publications.title: KACQ-DCNN: Uncertainty-Aware Interpretable Kolmogorov-Arnold Classical-Quantum Dual-Channel Neural Network for Heart Disease Detection
publications.authors: Jahin, M. A., Masud, M. A., Mridha, M. F., Aung, Z., & Dey, N.
publications.description: A hybrid classical-quantum neural network with uncertainty awareness and interpretability for heart disease detection.

publications.title: MosQNet-SA: Explainable convolutional-attention network for mosquito classification with application as a RESTful API for dengue and malaria risk mapping
publications.authors: Masud, M. A., Akter, S., Sultana, N., Islam, M. S., Yousuf, M. A., Noori, F. M., & Uddin, M. Z.
publications.description: An explainable CNN with an attention mechanism for mosquito classification, deployed as a RESTful API for disease risk mapping.

publications.title: Lorentz-Equivariant Quantum Graph Neural Network for High-Energy Physics
publications.authors: Jahin, M. A., Masud, M. A., Suva, M. W., Mridha, M. F., & Dey, N.
publications.description: A quantum graph neural network that respects Lorentz symmetry, designed for high-energy physics applications.

publications.title: Multi-Layered Password-Based Steganography: A Novel Approach for Tiered Information Hiding
publications.authors: Masud, M. A., Akter, S., Sultana, N., Yousuf, M. A., & Uddin, M. Z.
publications.description: A new steganography technique using multiple password layers for enhanced security and tiered data hiding.

publications.title: Dream: A Novel Explainable Neural Network for Detecting Sleep Apnea Using Single-Lead ECG Signals
publications.authors: Akter, S., Masud, M. A., Promi, M. S. I., Sultana, N., Ahmed, M., Rahman, M. M., Yousuf, M. A., Aloteibi, S., & Moni, M. A.
publications.description: An explainable deep learning model named Dream for accurate sleep apnea detection from single-lead ECG signals.

publications.title: Quantum Rationale-Aware Graph Contrastive Learning for Jet Discrimination
publications.authors: Jahin, M. A., Masud, M. A., Mridha, M. F., & Dey, N.
publications.description: A novel graph contrastive learning method with quantum computing principles for improved jet discrimination in particle physics.

publications.title: Pseudo-RGB Data Augmentation for Improved Alzheimer's Disease Detection: An Analysis of CNN Performance
publications.authors: Masud, M. A., Akter, S., Sultana, N., Hosen, M. B., Anannya, M., Yousuf, M. A., Azad, A. K. M., Alyami, S. A., & Moni, M. A.
publications.description: An analysis of a pseudo-RGB data augmentation technique to enhance the performance of CNNs for Alzheimer's detection.

projects.title: Human Detection with YOLOv8
projects.subtitle: A web application with a FastAPI backend and Streamlit frontend.
projects.description: Developed a full-stack web application for detecting humans in user-uploaded images. Features a YOLO object detection model backend (FastAPI), a Streamlit frontend, and is fully containerized with Docker for easy deployment on an AWS EC2 instance.

projects.title: Multi-Layered Password Steganography
projects.subtitle: A novel approach for tiered information hiding.
projects.description: Developing a novel steganography technique using multiple password layers for enhanced security and tiered data protection, based on research for ECCE 2025.

projects.title: Privacy-Robustness Bound in Federated Learning
projects.subtitle: A theoretical framework for the privacy-robustness trade-off.
projects.description: This research proposes and empirically validates a Privacy-Robustness Bound (PRB), a theoretical framework for quantifying the trade-off between differential privacy and model robustness against poisoning attacks in federated learning.

projects.title: Monte Carlo Simulation for Bangladesh Election
projects.subtitle: Statistical Modeling for Political Analysis
projects.description: Developing statistical models using Monte Carlo methods to analyze electoral patterns and political spectrum distribution in Bangladesh.

projects.title: Ice Cream Brand Analysis
projects.subtitle: Data analysis of consumer preferences and market trends.
projects.description: An analysis project focused on the ice cream market, exploring brand popularity, consumer sentiment, and market trends using modern data analysis techniques.

projects.title: Clickshots Package
projects.subtitle: Python Package for Screenshot Automation
projects.description: Building a comprehensive Python package for automated screenshot capture and processing with advanced image manipulation capabilities.
